headline: GTA Online
subtitle: INDEPENDENCE DAY 2018: Extended Discounts
content:
Turn your fledgling enterprise into a bustling empire by acquiring and jumpstarting these businesses:

Hangars – 50% off
Executive Offices – 50% off
Special Cargo Warehouses – 50% off
Biker Clubhouses & Businesses – 50% off

Plus extended discounts on Facilities, portable crime centers and fan-favorite vehicles. Check out the Rockstar Newswire for all the details.
